```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
# load the  PxP data 
pbp_2023 <- read_csv ("~/Downloads/pbp_2023_d1.csv")
```
```{r}
pbp_2023 %>% 
  group_by(team,action) %>% 
  summarize(total = n()) %>%
      arrange(team,action)
```
```{r}
pbp_2023 <- seconds %>% 
  filter(action=="REBOUND" | vendor_name=="REBOUND")
```
```{r}
# question 1: Which Big Ten team was the best at steals in the first quarter?”
pbp_2023 %>% 
  group_by(conference,team,action,seconds) %>% 
  summarize(total = n()) %>%
      arrange(conference,team,action,seconds)
